name: average-bicycle-counts
title: Average Bicycle Counts by Day and Hour—January 2016 to June 2016
description: Bicycle data from active transport sites installed by TMR. Data is by hour and day of the week.

resources.name: active-transport-sites
resources.title: Active Transport Sites
resources.description: Sites from which bicycle count data was gathered

fields.name: SITE_ID
fields.title: Site Identifier
fields.description: A unique identifier for each data collection site

fields.name: DESCRIPTION
fields.title: Site Description
fields.description: A descriptive name for the data collection site

fields.name: LONGITUDE
fields.title: Longitude
fields.description: A Latitude for the site within Queensland

fields.name: LATITUDE
fields.title: Latitude
fields.description: A Latitude for the site within Queensland

resources.name: average-bicycle-counts-by-day-and-hour
resources.title: Average Bicycle Counts by Day and Hour—January 2016 to June 2016
resources.description: Bicycle data from active transport sites installed by TMR. Data is by hour and day of the week.

fields.name: SITE_ID
fields.title: Site Identifier
fields.description: A unique identifier for each data collection site

fields.name: DESCRIPTION
fields.title: Site Description
fields.description: A descriptive name for the data collection site

fields.name: MONTHS
fields.title: Month
fields.description: Month data was collected in e.g. January

fields.name: YEARS
fields.title: Year
fields.description: Year data was collected in e.g. 2016

fields.name: HOURS
fields.title: Hour
fields.description: Hour data was collected in e.g. 0..23

fields.name: SATURDAY
fields.title: Saturday
fields.description: Average amount of bicycle counts that were recorded at this site on this day and time. Can be null if there is a error recording data.

fields.name: SUNDAY
fields.title: Sunday
fields.description: Average amount of bicycle counts that were recorded at this site on this day and time. Can be null if there is a error recording data.

fields.name: MONDAY
fields.title: Monday
fields.description: Average amount of bicycle counts that were recorded at this site on this day and time. Can be null if there is a error recording data.

fields.name: TUESDAY
fields.title: Tuesday
fields.description: Average amount of bicycle counts that were recorded at this site on this day and time. Can be null if there is a error recording data.

fields.name: WEDNESDAY
fields.title: Wednesday
fields.description: Average amount of bicycle counts that were recorded at this site on this day and time. Can be null if there is a error recording data.

fields.name: THURSDAY
fields.title: Thursday
fields.description: Average amount of bicycle counts that were recorded at this site on this day and time. Can be null if there is a error recording data.

fields.name: FRIDAY
fields.title: Friday
fields.description: Average amount of bicycle counts that were recorded at this site on this day and time. Can be null if there is a error recording data.
